attributes.action: Reinstate Kevin Pietersen to the England cricket team
attributes.additional_details: Cricket management have taken the unilateral decision to remove arguably England's most exciting batsman of the modern era from the national team in his prime. Let the fans decide whether KP has more to offer England, rather than a quango of cricket adminstrators. Who fills the stands at Lords, Trent Bridge and Egdbaston? The people do.
